1D26C9E379A743AF95707515085B7ECE.description: Identify the centre of gravity in a model structure, and demonstrate that changes in the location of a structure’s centre of gravity affect its stability

98037266DEDD4A7F8C99C494F29E3145.description: Use appropriate vocabulary related to their investigations of interactions within ecosystems

40CB261216E948ACB0F554D38436DA8C.description: Demonstrate confidence in their ability to carry out investigations

07D80D38EAE84477B449F8BBB2E5A400.description: Discuss societal, environmental, and economic impacts of scientific and technological endeavours.
